import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute, Router } from '@angular/router'; import { Chat } from '../models/chat'; import { WorkshopService } from '../workshop.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-workshop-messages', templateUrl: './workshop-messages.component.html', styleUrls: ['./workshop-messages.component.css'] }) export class WorkshopMessagesComponent implements OnInit { constructor(private workshopService: WorkshopService, private router: Router, private route : ActivatedRoute) { } displayChat(chatIndex){ this.chatDisplayed[chatIndex] = 1; } hideChat(chatIndex){ this.chatDisplayed[chatIndex] = 0; } workshopId : string; chatDisplayed : number[]; chats: Chat[]; ngOnInit(): void { this.workshopId = this.route.snapshot.paramMap.get('workshopIdMess'); this.workshopService.getChatsByWorkshop(this.workshopId).subscribe((resp)=>{ this.chats = resp as Chat[]; this.chatDisplayed = []; for(let i = 0; i < this.chats.length; i++){ this.chatDisplayed[i] = 0; } }) } }
